ou3

Class QueryMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ou3.Message
      • ou3.QueryMessage

  • public class QueryMessage
extends Message
    The Class QueryMessage. A query for a certain event can be initiated from a querynode. From there the query will be forwarded to the node which detected the particular event.
    See Also:
    Message

    • Method Detail

      • getSucces

        public static int getSucces()

        Returns:
        the succes

      • getTotal

        public static int getTotal()
        Gets the total number of sent queries sent including the unsuccsessful ones.
        Returns:
        the total amount sent

      • choseTarget

        protected Node choseTarget()
        Overriden abstract method. Will chose the target differently depending on the current status. Status:

        SEARCHING: use the standard findNewPath() to continue randomly.

        ROUTING: follow the Route in the Node s routingTable.

        BACKTRACKING: follow the path backwards.

        Specified by:
        choseTarget in class Message
        Returns:
        the chosen Node for target
        See Also:
        Message.choseTarget()

      • processMessage

        public void processMessage()
        Overriden abstract method. Will process differently depending on current status. Status:

        SEARCHING: check if the routingtable in the node contains the target event. If so start ROUTING.

        ROUTING: check whether the Route has been followed to the end. If so start BACKTRACKING.

        BACKTRACKING: check whether back to start If so print the Event, mark succes and destroy.

        Specified by:
        processMessage in class Message
        See Also:
        Message.processMessage()

      • stepUpdate

        public boolean stepUpdate()
        Overriden abstract method. Update the QueryMessage after the timeStep, incrementing the attemptTime, and (decrement) the timeToLive if SEARCHING. If they reach their limits, restart if firstAttempt or return false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        stepUpdate in class Message
        Returns:
        true if it survives
        See Also:
        Message.stepUpdate()

      • setLifeLength

        public static void setLifeLength(int lifeLength)
        Sets the life length of the query.
        Parameters:
        lifeLength, - new life length

      • sendingUpdate

        protected void sendingUpdate()
        Overriden abstract method. Will update differently depending on current status. If SEARCHING or ROUTING add the currentPosition to the path. If BACKTRACKING pop the top of the path.
        Specified by:
        sendingUpdate in class Message
        See Also:
        Message.sendingUpdate()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return String of some information about the Message.

        Returns:

      • restartQuery

        private void restartQuery()
        Restart query. Used if firstAttempt failed.
